item.title: Christmas 'miracle': Truck carrying hams smashes into historic archway
item.description:
A truck carrying Christmas hams smashed into a historic church archway in Auckland on Monday, completely destroying the solid concrete structure.
Reverend Jan Wallace of the Pukekohe Anglican Church ...

item.title: Suite as: Family in managed isolation hotel upgraded to penthouse
item.description:
